How to use the library appÂ¶

To use the app and borrow a book, you need to:

  1. login or register
  1. browse available books and click on the one you like
  1. click the ‘Borrow’ or ‘Wishlist’ button
  1. if you chose ‘Wishlist’ the book will be added to your wishlist and you can borrow it at a later date
  2. if you chose ‘Borrow’ you will be taken to checkout page where you will have to confirm your delivery information
